tool_description: An API gathering news articles about President Joe Biden from top news sources on the internet.
name: President Joe Biden News
title: President Joe Biden News

api_list.name: Get Joe Biden news from specific outlet
api_list.description: Returns Joe Biden headlines from a specific news outlet.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://president-joe-biden-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/cbs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "president-joe-biden-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://president-joe-biden-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{outlets}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "president-joe-biden-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Joe Biden News
api_list.description: This endpoint return all headlines about President Joe Biden from a variety of news organizations.
